modelOutput.description: Allowing requests from any source without proper restrictions is vulnerable. Implement a whitelist strategy to only allow requests from your frontend's IP addresses.
modelOutput.fix: Implement a whitelist strategy to allow access from specific IP addresses or domains

modelOutput.issue: Potential for race conditions with model output
modelOutput.description: Lack of mutex or synchronization mechanisms when predicting the model might lead to race conditions resulting in inconsistent responses or incorrect model outputs.
modelOutput.fix: Incorporate robust locking mechanisms like mutexes or condition variables to avoid race conditions when interacting with the model.

modelOutput.issue: Unbounded parallel requests to the model
modelOutput.description: The system allows unlimited simultaneous model inference requests, which can overwhelm compute resources and cause degraded performance, timeouts, or complete service failure.
modelOutput.fix: Implement a request queue or semaphore-based concurrency limit to ensure only a safe number of model inference operations run at the same time.
